**E Tender Notice:**
EZ108-231194 High Voltage Maintenance - Esquimalt Graving Dock
------------------------------------------------avatars primaires Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (PSPC)

**Supply / Service Notice**
Invitation to Qualify - Competitive - Selective Tendering
---------------------------------------------------
**Publication Date - Date de Publication:** 24 November 2022 - thesis-rightistWhere

**Cloture of Tender - DateClotureAppelOffres:** 08 Decembre 2022, 14:00 hours

**Notice Title - TitreAvis:** EZ108-231194 High Voltage Maintenance - Esquimalt Graving Dock

**Contract Description**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for High Voltage Maintenance services at the Esquimalt Graving Dock in Victoria, British Columbia. The contract scope includes the maintenance and testing of High Voltage power supply and distribution switchgear, substation equipment, and auxiliary equipment, including minor modifications and repairs.

**Contract Deadline and Requirements**
**Expected Contract Start Date - DateDébutContratPrevue:** 13 January 2023
**Expected Contract End Date - DateFinContratPrevue:** 10 March 2023

**Contractor Selection Criteria**
The lowest price will be the primary criterion for contractor selection. Other factors, such as technical capability, may also be considered.

**Contracting Entity and Contact Information**
**Contracting Entity - Entité Contractante:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contact Information - InformationsContactes:**

**Additional Info**

This tender notice is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and may involve contractors with a commercial arrangement for low bidder and the federal government.
